article_title: Uncertainty About $15 Minimum Wages Is Not A Good Thing

article_metadata.author: Modeled Behavior

og.description: The idea that a minimum wage hike of an unprecedented magnitude like the one Los Angeles is undertaking creates neutral uncertainty is like someone drinking more beer than they ever have just being uncertain about what it will do to their driving ability. There will be job losses.
